meanings.definition: Able to be used for many different purposes.
meanings.sent1: The multipurpose tool can be used for various tasks around the house.
meanings.sent2: She bought a multipurpose cleaner that works on different surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The multipurpose kitchen gadget made cooking more fun and efficient.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a multipurpose toolbox, ready for any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The multipurpose backpack had compartments for all her belongings.

meanings.definition: Designed to be used in many different ways.
meanings.sent1: The multipurpose furniture in the room could be a table or a chair.
meanings.sent2: He created a multipurpose app that could be used for various tasks.
meanings.sent3: The multipurpose vehicle transformed into a mini-camper for the weekend trip.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a multipurpose tool, always finding new uses for things.
meanings.sent5: The multipurpose building had flexible spaces for different events.
